pullrequest.title: Simplify the process of using gazebo as a library

content.raw:
I'm also seeing the following error message fairly frequently (1 in 4) when opening gzserver:
~~~
Error [Node.cc:84] No namespace found
~~~
I haven't noticed it causing any problems, but it's probably bad anyway.

There's also quite a few instances in the [jenkins console output](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/197/consoleFull)
